description: Try this slow-cooker spinach and ricotta cannelloni recipe for a fuss-free weeknight dinner. Cooking cannelloni has never been easier.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Video,Weeknight dinner,Sesame free,Microwave,Tamara,Slow cooker,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Slow-Cooker Spinach & Ricotta Cannelloni Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450g Woolworths Macro Organic frozen chopped spinach
60g parmesan, finely grated, plus extra shaved parmesan to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Microwave spinach in a microwave-safe bowl on high for 8 minutes or until thawed. Drain. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out excess liquid.

Place spinach in a large bowl with ricotta, nutmeg, parmesan and egg, then mix to combine. Transfer spinach mixture to a piping bag fitted with a large plain nozzle. Pipe mixture into cannelloni tubes. Layer cannelloni in rows in a 2.5-litre slow cooker*.

Combine passata, garlic, basil and 1/2 cup water in a large jug. Pour passata mixture over cannelloni. Cook on high for 4 hours (or low for 8 hours) or until cannelloni is tender. Serve cannelloni topped with rocket and extra parmesan.
